#include <iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
//#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 int t,a,b,arr[10][4001],mul[40001],i,j,rem,de,sum;
       for(j=2;j<=9;j++)
       {
			for( i=0;i<=4000;i++)
            mul[i]=-1;
            mul[0]=1;
         for(i=1;i<=4000;i++)
         {
				sum=0;rem=0;
				for(int x=0;mul[x]!=-1;x++)
                 {
                  mul[x]=mul[x]*j+rem;
                  rem=mul[x]/10;
                  mul[x]=mul[x]%10;
                  sum=sum+mul[x];
                  if(rem!=0 && mul[x+1]==-1)
                  {
                  mul[x+1]=rem;
                  sum=sum+mul[x+1];
                  x++;
				  }
                 }
                 
                 arr[j][i]=sum;
                 //cout<<j<<"^"<<i<<"="<<arr[j][i]<<endl;
                 
         }
         
       }
    cin>>t;
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
    cin>>a>>b;
       if(a==1 || b==0)
       {
       cout<<"Case "<<i<<": "<<"1"<<endl;
	   }
	   else
	   cout<<"Case "<<i<<": "<<arr[a][b]<<endl;
	
}  //getch();
   return 0;
}
